summary.span: 当实现时，对 值进行动画处理的抽象类。

span.span: Abstract class that, when implemented, animates a value.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在中使用类 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] ，但一般显示如何使用其他派生类（如） 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], but generically shows how to use other derived classes such as . [!code-xaml[keyframes_ovw_snippet#AltDoubleAnimationUsingKeyFramesWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/keyframes_ovw_snippet/CS/AltDoubleAnimationUsingKeyFramesExample.xaml#altdoubleanimationusingkeyframeswholepage)]

summary.span: 创建此 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values.

summary.span: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

returns.span: 当前对象的可修改复本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使源的 属性为 ，所克隆的对象的 属性也将为 。

span.span: The cloned object's property will be even if the source's property was .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成冻结 对象 (或任何对象) 的可修改副本 。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法使用强类型实现隐藏了继承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## Examples [Freezable 对象概述Freezable Objects Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview)

span.span: Gets the current value of the animation.

MemberSignature.Value: public short GetCurrentValue (short defaultOriginValue, short defaultDestinationValue, System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock animationClock);
.method public hidebysig instance int16 GetCurrentValue(int16 defaultOriginValue, int16 defaultDestinationValue, class System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock animationClock) cil managed
Public Function GetCurrentValue (defaultOriginValue As Short, defaultDestinationValue As Short, animationClock As AnimationClock) As Short
public: short GetCurrentValue(short defaultOriginValue, short defaultDestinationValue, System::Windows::Media::Animation::AnimationClock ^ animationClock);
override this.GetCurrentValue : int16 * int16 * System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock -> int16

param.name: defaultOriginValue
param.span: 如果动画不具有其自己的起始值，则为动画提供原始值。

span.span: The origin value provided to the animation if the animation does not have its own start value.

param.name: defaultDestinationValue
param.span: 如果动画没有自己的目标值，则为提供给动画的目标值。

span.span: The destination value provided to the animation if the animation does not have its own destination value.

param.name: animationClock
param.span: 动画将使用可以生成 或 值的 来生成其输出值。

span.span: The which can generate the or value to be used by the animation to generate its output value.
Gets the current value of the animation.

returns.span: 此动画信任的值应为该属性的当前值。

span.span: The value this animation believes should be the current value for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数的值 `defaultOriginValue` 取决于动画在组合链中的位置：The value of the `defaultOriginValue` parameter depends on the animation's position in the composition chain: - 如果动画位于组合链中的第一个位置并替换另一个动画， `defaultOriginValue` 则是该动画在被替换时的输出。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and it replaces another animation, `defaultOriginValue` is the output of that animation at the time it was replaced. - 如果动画位于组合链中的第一个位置，并且不存在要替换的动画， `defaultOriginValue` 则是已进行动画处理的属性的基值。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and no animation exists to replace, `defaultOriginValue` is the base value of the animated property. - 如果此动画不在组合链的第一个位置，则 `defaultOriginValue` 是组合链中的前一个动画返回的值，此值 不是 。If this animation is not in the first position of a composition chain, then `defaultOriginValue` is the value that is returned by the previous animation in the composition chain that has an that is not . 参数的值 `defaultDestinationValue` 取决于是否有以前的属性 组合层。The value of the `defaultDestinationValue` parameter depends on whether there is a previous property composition layer. - 如果有上一个属性 组合层， `defaultDestinationValue` 则为该层的输出。If there is a previous property composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the output from that layer. - 如果没有上一个组合层， `defaultDestinationValue` 则是要进行动画处理的属性的基值。If there is no previous composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value of the property that you are animating. 有关动画组合的详细信息，请参阅 [动画和计时系统概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview)。For more information about animation composition, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview). 有关创建自定义动画类型的详细信息，请参阅 [自定义动画概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview)。For more information about creating custom animation types, see the [Custom Animations Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview).

Gets the current value of the animation.

span.span: The value this animation believes should be the current value for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数的值 `defaultOriginValue` 取决于动画在组合链中的位置：The value of the `defaultOriginValue` parameter depends on the animation's position in the composition chain: - 如果动画位于组合链中的第一个位置并替换另一个动画， `defaultOriginValue` 则是该动画在被替换时的输出。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and it replaces another animation, `defaultOriginValue` is the output of that animation at the time it was replaced. - 如果动画位于组合链中的第一个位置，并且不存在要替换的动画， `defaultOriginValue` 则是已进行动画处理的属性的基值。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and no animation exists to replace, `defaultOriginValue` is the base value of the animated property. - 如果此动画不在组合链的第一个位置，则 `defaultOriginValue` 是组合链中的前一个动画返回的值，此值 不是 。If this animation is not in the first position of a composition chain, then `defaultOriginValue` is the value that is returned by the previous animation in the composition chain that has an that is not . 参数的值 `defaultDestinationValue` 取决于是否有以前的属性 组合层。The value of the `defaultDestinationValue` parameter depends on whether there is a previous property composition layer. - 如果有上一个属性 组合层， `defaultDestinationValue` 则为该层的输出。If there is a previous property composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the output from that layer. - 如果没有上一个组合层， `defaultDestinationValue` 则是要进行动画处理的属性的基值。If there is no previous composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value of the property that you are animating. 有关动画组合的详细信息，请参阅 [动画和计时系统概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview)。For more information about animation composition, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview). 有关创建自定义动画类型的详细信息，请参阅 [自定义动画概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview)。For more information about creating custom animation types, see the [Custom Animations Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview).

param.name: defaultOriginValue
param.span: 建议使用的原始值。如果动画没有自己显式设置的起始值，则使用该值。

span.span: The suggested origin value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set start value.

param.name: defaultDestinationValue
param.span: 建议使用的目标值。如果动画没有自己显式设置的结束值，则使用该值。

span.span: The suggested destination value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set end value.

param.name: animationClock
param.span: 一个 ，用来生成主机动画所使用的 或 。

span.span: An that generates the or used by the host animation.

summary.span: 计算一个值，该值表示正在进行动画处理的属性的当前值，并由主机动画确定。

span.span: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by the host animation.

returns.span: 计算得出的属性值，该值由当前动画确定。

span.span: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current animation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数的值 `defaultOriginValue` 取决于动画在组合链中的位置：The value of the `defaultOriginValue` parameter depends on the animation's position in the composition chain: - 如果动画位于组合链中的第一个位置并替换另一个动画， `defaultOriginValue` 则是该动画在被替换时的输出。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and it replaces another animation, `defaultOriginValue` is the output of that animation at the time it was replaced. - 如果动画位于组合链中的第一个位置，并且不存在要替换的动画， `defaultOriginValue` 则是已进行动画处理的属性的基值。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and no animation exists to replace, `defaultOriginValue` is the base value of the animated property. - 如果此动画不在组合链的第一个位置，则 `defaultOriginValue` 是组合链中的前一个动画返回的值，此值 不是 。If this animation is not in the first position of a composition chain, then `defaultOriginValue` is the value that is returned by the previous animation in the composition chain that has an that is not . 参数的值 `defaultDestinationValue` 取决于是否有以前的属性 组合层。The value of the `defaultDestinationValue` parameter depends on whether there is a previous property composition layer. - 如果有上一个属性 组合层， `defaultDestinationValue` 则为该层的输出。If there is a previous property composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the output from that layer. - 如果没有上一个组合层， `defaultDestinationValue` 则是要进行动画处理的属性的基值。If there is no previous composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value of the property that you are animating. 有关动画组合的详细信息，请参阅 [动画和计时系统概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview)。For more information about animation composition, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview). 有关创建自定义动画类型的详细信息，请参阅 [自定义动画概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview)。For more information about creating custom animation types, see the [Custom Animations Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview).
